dt: {bc}to refuse to undertake, undergo, engage in, or comply with

pt: {sc}decline{/sc} {sc}refuse{/sc} {sc}reject{/sc} {sc}repudiate{/sc} {sc}spurn{/sc} mean to turn away by not accepting, receiving, or considering. {sc}decline{/sc} often implies courteous refusal especially of offers or invitations.
{sc}refuse{/sc} suggests more positiveness or ungraciousness and often implies the denial of something asked for.
{sc}reject{/sc} implies a peremptory refusal by sending away or discarding.
{sc}repudiate{/sc} implies a casting off or disowning as untrue, unauthorized, or unworthy of acceptance.

pt.t: teenagers who {it}repudiate{/it} the values of their parents

pt: {sc}spurn{/sc} stresses contempt or disdain in rejection or repudiation.

et: Middle English, from Anglo-French {it}decliner{/it}, from Latin {it}declinare{/it} to turn aside, inflect, from {it}de-{/it} + {it}clinare{/it} to incline {ma}{mat|lean|}{/ma}

dt: {bc}a gradual physical or mental sinking and wasting away
{bc}a change to a lower state or level
{bc}the period during which something is deteriorating or approaching its end

pt: {sc}deterioration{/sc} {sc}degeneration{/sc} {sc}decadence{/sc} {sc}decline{/sc} mean the falling from a higher to a lower level in quality, character, or vitality. {sc}deterioration{/sc} implies generally the impairment of value or usefulness.

pt.t: the {it}deterioration{/it} of the house through neglect

pt: {sc}degeneration{/sc} stresses physical, intellectual, or especially moral retrogression.

pt.t: the {it}degeneration{/it} of their youthful idealism into cynicism

pt: {sc}decadence{/sc} presupposes a reaching and passing the peak of development and implies a turn downward with a consequent loss in vitality or energy.

pt.t: cited love of luxury as a sign of cultural {it}decadence{/it}

pt: {sc}decline{/sc} differs from {sc}decadence{/sc} in suggesting a more markedly downward direction and greater momentum as well as more obvious evidence of deterioration.

pt.t: the meteoric {it}decline{/it} of his career after the scandal
